input.user_requirements: Homepage with a hero section showcasing a SaaS product, pricing page with three tiers (Free, Pro, Enterprise), and a contact form page.

files.app/page.tsx: // Homepage with hero section using Tailwind classes for modern design
files.app/pricing/page.tsx: // Three-tier pricing grid with beautiful cards and hover effects
files.app/contact/page.tsx: // Accessible contact form with proper validation and styling
files.app/layout.tsx: // Root layout with navigation and footer
files.components/Button.tsx: // Reusable styled button component with variants
files.components/Card.tsx: // Reusable card component with shadows and hover states
files.components/Footer.tsx: // Footer with links and social media
files.tailwind.config.ts: // Tailwind configuration with custom colors and fonts
